cause.description: Action For Everyone was started with the idea that people can (and should) take small actions every day that support what they believe in. Whether it’s writing letters, clicking on banners, signing petitions or whatever, it all makes a difference. We believe in the power of individuals making a difference and furthermore, we believe that it doesn’t have to take a lot of effort. Find out more at actionforeveryone.com 1. Individuals can make a difference 2. Taking action around a cause you believe in doesn't have to take a lot of time or money 3. By encouraging action in others, we will all benefit
cause.mission: Encourage individuals to take action around causes they believe in and make people realize one person can have impact
cause.name: Action For Everyone
